backend/main.mo: Main backend actor managing user profiles, menu items, gallery images, and access control, with admin‑gated mutations and public queries.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old order records to a new format with string principals and default contact info while preserving other actor data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs for authentication and admin access changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend admin and public pages, components, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global site styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top‑level React router configuration defining all public and admin routes with AdminGuard protection for admin pages.
Displays dismissible active promotions based on date ranges, pulling data from useGetPromotions.
Protects admin routes by checking authentication and admin status, showing appropriate messages or content.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button handling login/logout via Internet Identity with loading and error recovery.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting authenticated non-admin users on admin routes to create a basic profile.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer showing contact info, quick links, social icons, and opening hours fetched from backend data.
Lightbox dialog that displays a selected image with navigation controls and an optional caption.
frontend/src/components/HeaderNav.tsx: Responsive site header with navigation links, custom pages, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/OrderCart.tsx: Shopping cart component showing items, quantity controls, removal, and total price.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Top-level layout including header, footer, announcement bar, main content, and profile modal.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialsCaro: Carousel that displays customer testimonials with ratings and author info.

frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Provides hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, and admin status using the actor API with react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useContactInfo.ts: Hooks to get and update contact info from the actor with react-query and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useExport.ts: Exports backend data via the actor API and triggers a JSON file download.
frontend/src/hooks/useGallery.ts: Hooks to fetch, add, and remove gallery images with automatic cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, providing identity state, login, and logout via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useMenu.ts: Hooks to retrieve and manage menu items including add, update, and remove operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Hooks for retrieving orders and performing order operations like placing and updating status.
frontend/src/hooks/usePages.ts: Hooks to fetch, create, update, and delete CMS pages with targeted cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/usePromotions.ts: Hooks to list, add, and remove promotions through the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useSeoMeta.ts: Hooks to fetch and update SEO metadata for specific pages.
frontend/src/hooks/useTestimonials.ts: Hooks to list, add, and delete testimonials with cache refresh.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color variables, typography, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with heritage, women-owned, and community sections using SEO metadata and contact info hooks.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminAdminsPage: Admin panel for adding or removing admin users by principal ID with role assignment and permission checks.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminContactPag: Admin form to view and update contact information including address, phone, email, hours, and map URL.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminExportPage: Admin page providing full data export functionality with a single export action and status messaging.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminGalleryPag: Admin interface for uploading, listing, and deleting gallery images with captions and categories.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper for all admin pages with navigation sidebar and top bar including login and site-return buttons.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminMenuPage.t: Provides a CRUD interface for menu items with dialogs for adding and editing items using custom hooks.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Displays all orders with filtering, status updates, and detailed order viewing via dialogs.
Manages custom pages with CRUD operations and SEO metadata editing through a form dialog.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPromotions: Handles creation and deletion of promotions, including image upload and date fields.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSeoPage.ts: Allows editing of SEO metadata for predefined site pages using tabbed forms.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminTestimonia: Admin page to list, add, and delete testimonials using dialog forms and testimonial hooks.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact information including address, phone, WhatsApp, and email along with SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/CustomPage.tsx: Dynamically renders custom CMS-driven pages by slug, falling back to a not‑found message if missing.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Shows an image gallery with category filtering, lazy animations, a lightbox, and SEO data.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero content, highlights, menu and promotion data, testimonials, and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/MenuPage.tsx: Displays menu items with category filters, daily specials, and integrated SEO and contact info.
frontend/src/pages/OrderReservePage.tsx: Page for placing orders or table reservations, managing cart items, customer details, and submitting orders via hooks.
frontend/src/seo/SeoHead.tsx: Component that sets page-level SEO metadata and injects structured data for business info, menu, and promotions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project state file describing site goals, design direction, requirements, and known issues for the restaurant website.
